title: math/rand: document Rand output compatibility promise
body:
Using `go1.6`

It seems from [rand/regress_test.go](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/math/rand/regress_test.go) that there is an explicit test to:
> Test that random number sequences generated by a specific seed do not change from version to version.

The public documentation for [math/rand](https://golang.org/pkg/math/rand/) doesn't really saying anything about this. If there is a hard guarantee for deterministic output of Rand *between* versions of Go, can this be documented?
